display.title: Fusion Control Computer
description: Part of a multi-block generator that produces energy from various fluids.
It is unique in that it does not simply consume the fuel, but instead processes them into a new item.
It is also used as a machine to produce Platinum Dust and Iridium Ore.
It must be combined with a minimum of 16 Fusion Coils to create a usable fusion reactor.
It provides an adjustable hologram of the various sizes of multi-block with the H button on the item's menu. Togglable on and off.
Outputs energy on the top and bottom while crafting.
Inputs energy on the sides while not crafting.
Base Generation Rate - can be many multiples of this depending on the size of the reactor.

subtitle.text: Part of a multi-block generator that produces energy from various fluids.
